title: NVIDIA Triton 服务器漏洞允许未授权攻击者执行代码并劫持AI服务器
title_translated: NVIDIA Triton server leaks allow unauthorized assailants to enforce codes and hijack AI servers
summary: NVIDIA Triton Access Server has multiple security loopholes that can be used to take over vulnerable servers, leading to remote code execution, information disclosure, and denial of service.

title: FreeBuf早报 | "瘟疫"恶意软件攻击Linux；PlayPraetor安卓木马感染超1.1万台设备
title_translated: FreeBuf Mornings, | 瘟 瘟 瘟 瘟 瘟 疫 软件
summary: A new Linux backdoor program Plague uses PAM module to bypass authentication, steal documents for up to one year, and has four main features, such as anti-debugging and removal of traces.

title: 威胁组织利用AI扩大攻击规模、加速攻击并针对自主AI代理发起攻击
title_translated: Threat groups use AI to scale up attacks, accelerate attacks and launch attacks against autonomous AI agents
summary: Threat organizations weaponize AI to launch complex attacks, enable less technically capable opponents to carry out advanced attacks.

title: 微软 Office 漏洞允许攻击者执行远程代码
title_translated: Microsoft Office bug allows the assailant to execute remote code
summary: Several key loopholes in Microsoft Office may allow attackers to enforce random codes on affected systems, exploiting memory management weaknesses and type confusion. The vulnerabilities can be triggered by malicious files or macros.

title: 人工智能可能修复帮助传播了 15 年的漏洞
title_translated: The repair of artificial intelligence may have helped spread a 15-year gap.
summary: An AI tool that lasts 10 years can help eliminate a loophole in Node.js code that allows attackers to navigate outside the specified directory. The loophole has been embedded in the culture of developers and is now reproduced by AI models.

title: Злоумышленники взломали Telegram-аккаунт мурманского вице-губернатора
title_translated: Attackers hacked the Telegram account of Murmansk Vice-Governor
summary: Phishing attack compromised the account of Oksana Demchenko, first Deputy Governor of the Murmansk region, allowing fraudsters to intercept accounts in messengers.

title: Shade BIOS: новый вектор атаки из BIOS, невидимый для антивирусов и ОС
title_translated: Shade BIOS: a new attack vector from BIOS, invisible to antiviruses and OS
summary: Attack vector called Shade BIOS allows malicious code to run directly from BIOS, without interacting with OS. Can be written in ordinary C and runs on any device supporting UEFI.

title: Лаборатория Касперского увеличила долю в капитале Ximi Pro до 90%
title_translated: Kaspersky Lab Increases Share in Ximi Pro to 90%
summary: Kaspersky Lab increased its share in Ximi Pro, a company specializing in container IT infrastructures.

title: За эксплойт 0-Click в WhatsApp* дадут миллион долларов на Pwn2Own
title_translated: For the exploit 0-Click in WhatsApp* will give a million dollars on Pwn2Own
summary: WhatsApp offers a $1 million reward for a zero-click RCE exploit, which can take control of devices through the messenger.

title: Россия опустилась на 8 место в рейтинге DDoS-атак, в лидерах — США и Китай
title_translated: Russia dropped to 8th place in the ranking of DDoS-attacks, the leaders are the United States and China
summary: Cyberattacks intensified in the second quarter of 2025, with DDoS attacks increasing by 108% compared to the same period last year. Countries like Iran and Israel broke into the top 5 most attacked countries due to their conflict.

title: Вредоносные файлы выдают за аниме — «Наруто», «Титаны» и др.
title_translated: Malicious files are issued as anime - "Naruto", "Titans", etc.
summary: Attackers use anime names as bait to lure victims into downloading malicious files, which can install data-stealing or remote-access tools.

title: Positive Technologies за первое полугодие увеличила отгрузки на 49%
title_translated: Positive Technologies increased shipments by 49% in the first half of the year
summary: Positive Technologies published financial results, showing growth in shipments and revenue. No unique CVE IDs present.

title: Доступ к Госуслугам предлагают восстановить через MAX
title_translated: Access to public services offered to restore through MAX
summary: Attempted hacking and phishing activity on State Services portal due to increased access options.

title: PaperCut NG/MF Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) Vulnerability
title_translated: PaperCut NG/MF Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) Vulnerability
summary: PaperCut NG/MF contains a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability, which could potentially enable an attacker to alter security settings or execute arbitrary code.

title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
title_translated: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
summary: Cisco Identity Services Engine contains an injection vulnerability in a specific API allowing remote code execution and obtaining root privileges on affected devices.

title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
title_translated: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
summary: Cisco Identity Services Engine contains an injection vulnerability allowing remote code execution and obtaining root privileges on affected devices.

title: Malicious XDG Desktop File
summary: This module creates a malicious XDG Desktop file, which may not be trusted by default but can be run with user warning. Default file manager applications may impose stricter execution requirements.

title: Debian: CVE-2025-54572: ruby-saml -- security update
summary: The Ruby SAML library has a denial-of-service vulnerability in versions 1.18.0 and below, which occurs when validating Base64 format prior to checking message size, leading to potential resource exhaustion.
